# PHPMailer Installation

Please install PHPMailer using one of the following methods:

## Method 1: Composer (Recommended)

```bash
composer require phpmailer/phpmailer
```

## Method 2: Manual Download

1. Download from: https://github.com/PHPMailer/PHPMailer/releases
2. Extract to: `vendor/phpmailer/phpmailer/`
3. Ensure the structure is:
   ```
   vendor/phpmailer/phpmailer/src/PHPMailer.php
   vendor/phpmailer/phpmailer/src/SMTP.php
   vendor/phpmailer/phpmailer/src/Exception.php
   ```

See PHPMailer_SETUP.md for detailed configuration instructions.
